sentences.sentence: One of its leaders, named Saadati, was arrested while passing to the KGB a counterespionage file the group had taken when it attacked the Shah's secret-police offices.
sentences.translation: 组织一位名为萨达蒂的领导人在给克格勃传递反间谍资料的时候被捕；这些资料都是组织进攻伊朗王室秘密警察局的时候得到的。

sentences.sentence: By the time the conference call ended, it was nearly midnight at bank of America's headquarters in Charlotte, N.C., but the bank's counterespionage work was only just beginning.
sentences.translation: 当电话会议结束之时已是午夜时分，然而美国银行位于北卡罗莱那州夏洛特市的总部才刚刚开始其反间谍之征。
